itca.GreedySearch¶

class itca.GreedySearch(class_type='nominal', metric=<function itca>)¶

Search the class combination map that maximizes s-ITCA by greedy algorithm.

__init__(class_type='nominal', metric=<function itca>)¶

Searching strategy.

Parameters

class_type ({"nominal", "ordinal", "tree"}) – Type of classes.

Methods

__init__([class_type, metric])

Searching strategy.

combine_i_j(i, j, mapping)

Combine (merged) class labels i and j in mapping.

compute_itca(X, y, clf, mapping[, kfolds, …])

Given the data and a classifier, compute ITCA through cross validation.

next_mappings(mapping, class_type)

Generate mappings considered in the next round of search.

next_mappings_pruned(mapping, class_type, …)

Generate mappings considered in the next round of search.

search(X, y, clf[, kfolds, verbose, early_stop])

Search the best mapping start.
